transactionPerimeter.value: Systran SAS, Systran USA, SSI, SJGK, SCL

description.value: A pioneer and global leader in on-premise and cloud-based translation software, continuously evolving with breakthrough innovations and secured solutions, recently introducing Neural Machine Translation to corporate users via 3 offers. Has successfully built a wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer base across highly sensitive sectors. Evolved from a specialty translation provider to a pioneering digital translation player, and now a leading Neural Machine translation player.

value: Pioneer and global leader in on-premise and cloud-based translation software
Wide, diversified, loyal and growing customer base
Solid track record of sustainable growth
A long history as translation forerunner to support demanding customers in a quickly mutating translation environment
proximity and responsiveness with its customers across 8 countries
Several innovations implemented to address new client typologies and needs for cloud based products
very high educational level of workforce which enables it to address technical functions to further develop the business

growthStrategySummary.value: Ambitious growth strategy including accelerating cloud offering, increasing sales efforts to foster penetration of the B2C / SME segment, fostering R&D of transcript and context awareness translation, and entering the voice-translation market.

officeSpecificInfo.value: 23 bis, avenue de Messine, 75008 Paris, France

description.value: headquarter, sales office for Europe/Middle East and other region, R&D center of the group, European language-oriented R&D
Neural Machine Translation software offer for corporate users. New generation with a new user interface and an optimized architecture to enhance neural translations’ performance.
Cloud-based solution for advanced professional translation. Systran’s solution as a B2C Cloud SaaS, open to everyone, with online subscription, payment and configuration.

An application to customize Systran’s models by retraining them using private translation data. Solution allowing data owners to train its translation engines using its own data resulting in a customized translation model; offered via cloud or on premise. Usually sold with SPNS.
Used for ARR calculation.
Used for ARR calculation.
Includes one-shot maintenance.
Includes service revenue from SCL & SJGK.
Breakthrough innovation introduced by Systran to corporate users.
strategically located across 3 continents

segmentName.value: Worldwide language services and technologies market

characteristics.value: Historically market growth was mainly driven by expansion of global trade, increasing international content demand and internationalization of supply chains. The pandemic market experienced a 2% contraction in 2020 due to sectors heavily afflicted by the pandemic but was offset by diversity of sectors served & structural shift to remote workplace. Future market growth driven by recovery from the pandemic, and accelerated market penetration in Asia.
